version_description:
Haunted Fall Expansion:
- New character class: Witch
- Expanded dungeon feature
- New locations
- New enemies
- New quests
- No longer curses one out of ten thousand users with permanent critical fumbles
- Miscellaneous bugfixes

Haunted Fall Expansion:
- New character class: Witch
- Expanded dungeon feature
- New locations
- New enemies
- New quests
- No longer curses one out of ten thousand users with permanent critical fumbles
- Miscellaneous bugfixes

v2.32:
- Cloud Saves: Log in via the black-and-white Paradox Accounts button on the menu screen, and transport your save games between devices!
- Miscellaneous bugfixes.

v2.32:
- Cloud Saves: Log in via the black-and-white Paradox Accounts button on the menu screen, and transport your save games between devices!
- Miscellaneous bugfixes.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Improved Paradox Account login and GDPR compliance. Same great game as usual!
